song_lyric:

Yeah you're the one I want

But you're the one I want
Yeah you're the one I want

To the moon and back

Yeah you're the one I want
Yeah you're the one I want
I'm your lightening in a bottle
And you're the one I want
Yeah you're the one I want
I love you to the moon and back
To the moon and back
Call me crazy
But baby I love you to the moon and back
To the moon and back
Love is crazy
So let me take ya

I love you to the moon and back
To the moon and back
Call me crazy

To the moon and back
